title: I can only connect to custom games not blind pick
body: When I try to connect to a blind pick game a thing just says "Reconnect" and I click retry and it doesnt work, also I am %100 connected to the internet, but I can only use chat. Also when I play custom it works. I am using public wifi in a hotel. I do 1v1 with my friend in custom and that works. And when I do custom the ping is like 10-20

replies.body:
>  I am using public wifi in a hotel. 

There's your problem. If it's public wifi more people are going to be using it therefore the connection may not be as strong. I suggest not playing until you get home.

As I've stated on many threads everyone agrees to a TOU and EULA agreement stating that the player must have a sufficient and stable internet connection to run and play the game. Riot cannot fix this issue as I presume its to do with the internet at the hotel. I doubt hotel internet can run a game such as League of Legends and still provide internet for all other hotel guests.
Also I got a low priority queue for that.
